programme.desc: Babe, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest, returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, but after Farmer Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe has to go to the big city to save the farm.

programme.title: The Dilemma
programme.desc: A man discovers that his best friend's wife is having an affair.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: A frustrated office worker discovers that he is the son of a professional assassin, and that he shares his father's superhuman killing abilities.

programme.title: The girl on
programme.desc: A divorcee becomes entangled in a missing persons investigation that promises to send shockwaves throughout her life.

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: Babe, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest, returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, but after Farmer Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe has to go to the big city to save the farm.

programme.title: The Dilemma
programme.desc: A man discovers that his best friend's wife is having an affair.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: A frustrated office worker discovers that he is the son of a professional assassin, and that he shares his father's superhuman killing abilities.

programme.title: The Girl on the Train
programme.desc: A divorcee becomes entangled in a missing persons investigation that promises to send shockwaves throughout her life.

programme.title: Ride Along
programme.desc: Security guard Ben must prove himself to his girlfriend's brother, top police officer James. He rides along James on a 24-hour patrol of Atlanta.

programme.title: The Turning
programme.desc: A young governess is hired to look after an orphaned girl, but the return of the girl's problematic brother uncovers secrets from their past.

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: Two hardened criminals get into trouble with the US border patrol after meeting with a Mexican drug lord, and then revelations start to unfold.

programme.title: Fair Game (1989)
programme.desc: Gene, a clever but seriously deranged computer-game designer, has been left by his wife Eva. Unable to win her back, he decides to take revenge by locking Eva in her new apartment, inside which he has released a deadly mamba snake.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: When Cecilia's abusive ex takes his own life and leaves her his fortune, she suspects his death was a hoax. As a series of coincidences turn lethal, Cecilia works to prove that she is being hunted by someone nobody can see.

programme.title: Hanna
programme.desc: A sixteen-year-old girl who was raised by her father to be the perfect assassin is dispatched on a mission across Europe, tracked by a ruthless intelligence agent and her operatives.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: A journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone one week to the day after they view it.

programme.title: Morbius
programme.desc: Biochemist Michael Morbius tries to cure himself of a rare blood disease, but he inadvertently infects himself with a form of vampirism instead.

programme.title: Soldiers Of Fortune
programme.desc: Wealthy thrill-seekers pay huge premiums to have themselves inserted into military adventures, only this time things don't go exactly to plan.

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: Thirty years after the ring of the first bell, Rocky Balboa comes out of retirement and dons his gloves for his final fight against the reigning heavyweight champ Mason 'The Line' Dixon.

programme.title: Old
programme.desc: A vacationing family discovers that the secluded beach where they're relaxing for a few hours is somehow causing them to age rapidly, reducing their entire lives into a single day.

programme.title: White Noise
programme.desc: An architect's desire to speak with his wife from beyond the grave becomes an obsession with supernatural repercussions.

programme.title: Patient Zero
programme.desc: After an unprecedented global pandemic turns the majority of humankind into violent "Infected," a man gifted with the ability to speak the Infected's new language leads the last survivors on a hunt for Patient Zero and a cure.

programme.title: The Order
programme.desc: A playboy criminal contacts his dad after stealing a Faberge egg. Later it seems his dad has gone missing in Israel so he heads there. His disappearance is linked to the religious sect: The Order. Lots of fight and chase scenes.

programme.title: Bloodsport
programme.desc: "Bloodsport" follows Frank Dux, an American martial artist serving in the military, who decides to leave the army to compete in a martial arts tournament in Hong Kong where fights to the death can occur.

programme.title: 22 Jump Street
programme.desc: After making their way through high school (twice), big changes are in store for officers Schmidt and Jenko when they go deep undercover at a local college.

programme.title: Stargate: The Continuum
programme.desc: Ba'al travels back in time and prevents the Stargate program from being started. SG-1 must somehow restore history.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.
An astronaut crash lands on a mysterious planet only to discover he's not alone.

programme.title: Blood and Chocolate
programme.desc: A teenage werewolf is torn between honoring her family's secret and her love for a man.

programme.title: White Noise 2
programme.desc: Following the loss of his family, a man attempts suicide only to discover upon waking that he can identify people who are about to die

programme.title: Man Of Tai Chi
programme.desc: A young martial artist's unparalleled Tai Chi skills land him in a highly lucrative underworld fight club.

programme.title: Elephant White
programme.desc: An assassin is hired by a businessman to avenge the murder of his daughter by white slave traders in Thailand.

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: Eddie is mute, he takes a caretaker job at the coastal Lockbridge Academy to avoid homelessness. There, he forms a bond with cleaner Marie, while uncovering dark secrets that threaten the Aberdeen family's control of the school.

programme.title: The Tiger Rising
programme.desc: A young boy discovers a caged tiger in the woods near his home.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: A struggling musician realizes he's the only person on Earth who can remember The Beatles after waking up in an alternate reality where they never existed.

programme.title: Trolls World Tour
programme.desc: When the Queen of the Hard Rock Trolls tries to take over all the Troll kingdoms, Queen Poppy and her friends try different ways to save all the Trolls.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens misinterpret video feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth in the form of the video games.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

programme.title: Five Nights In Maine
programme.desc: A young African American man, reeling from the tragic loss of his wife, travels to rural Maine to seek answers from his estranged mother-in-law, who is herself confronting guilt and grief over her daughter's death.

programme.title: Hollywood Homicide
programme.desc: Two LAPD detectives who moonlight in other fields investigate the murder of an up-and-coming rap group.

programme.title: First Reformed
programme.desc: A minister of a small congregation in upstate New York grapples with mounting despair brought on by tragedy, worldly concerns and a tormented past.

programme.title: The Art of Self Defense
programme.desc: After being attacked on the street, a young man enlists at a local dojo, led by a charismatic and mysterious sensei, in an effort to learn how to defend himself from future threats.

programme.title: Hollywood On Set
programme.desc: Each week Hollywood On Set goes behind-the-scenes on three major motion pictures in production, featuring action footage and interviews with actors and filmmakers.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula and his friends try to bring out the monster in his half human, half vampire grandson in order to keep Mavis from leaving the hotel.

programme.title: The Professor And The Madman
programme.desc: Professor James Murray begins work compiling words for the first edition of the Oxford English Dictionary in the 19th century, and receives over 10,000 entries from a patient at Broadmoor Criminal Lunatic Asylum, Dr. William Minor.

programme.title: Call of the Wild 3D
programme.desc: A sled dog struggles for survival in the wilds of the Yukon.

programme.title: The Greatest Showman
programme.desc: Celebrates the birth of show business and tells of a visionary who rose from nothing to create a spectacle that became a worldwide sensation.

programme.title: Cloudy With A Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know that things are about to take a turn for the worst.

programme.title: Gretel and Hansel
programme.desc: In a distant land, two siblings, Hansel and Gretel, wander through the woods in search of food and work. When a mysterious lady offers them a way out, they accept without thinking about the consequences.

programme.title: Leave No Trace
programme.desc: A father and his seventeen-year-old daughter are living an ideal existence in a vast urban park in Portland, Oregon when a small mistake derails their lives forever.

programme.title: Big Fan
programme.desc: A hard-core New York Giants fan struggles to deal with the consequences when he is beaten up by his favorite player.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A malfunction in a sleeping pod on a spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet wakes one passenger 90 years early.

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, three lifelong friends spend the night in New York City looking for the Holy Grail of Christmas parties.

programme.title: Inside Man: Most Wanted
programme.desc: An NYPD hostage negotiator teams up with a federal agent to rescue dozens of tourists held hostage during a 10-hour siege at the U.S. Federal Reserve.

programme.title: Valkyrie

programme.title: Aurora (2019)
programme.desc: Aurora, a commitment-phobic party animal, meets Iranian Darian one night at a hot-dog stand in Lapland. Darian is running from death and Aurora is running from love. They need each other to finally stop running.

programme.title: Lucky Girl
programme.desc: TV star Nina Sokil is diagnosed with bone cancer, but deeming her career to be more important with her health, Nina goes to absurd lengths to hide her condition so that she keeps working.

programme.title: Cloves & Carnations
programme.desc: In snowy and desolate South Eastern Anatolian, Musa carries the corpse of his deceased wife to their homeland with his granddaughter. As they get closer to a country at war, their run-in with the police separates them in different directions.

programme.title: Khutulun: The Wrestling Princess
programme.desc: Princess Khutulun, a formidable Mongol warrior descended from Genghis Khan, has her marriage ambushed by an assassin who steals the Golden Sutra. Vowing revenge, Khutulun and her clan set out on an epic journey to retrieve the sacred text and restore peace.

programme.title: Black As The Snow 2: Dead At The Summit
programme.desc: An SUV races over the cliffs into the depths - the driver is killed instantly. The dead man was apparently involved in a robbery but there is no trace of the loot. French Officer Vivier and Swiss Captain Meyer once again team up to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Lost Transport
programme.desc: Spring 1945. A train deporting hundreds of Jewish prisoners gets stranded near a small German village occupied by the Red Army. A chance encounter between German girl Winnie, Dutch Jew Simone and Russian Vera leads to an unexpected friendship.

programme.title: The Boss and The Cutie
programme.desc: Totò is a rising boss of Neopolitan organised crime. Rosetta is a little girl in the fifth grade. After encountering nasty accidents and falling into comas, the both of them wake up in the hospital to find that they are trapped in the other’s body.

programme.title: Three Times Nothing
programme.desc: When three homeless friends win the lottery, they assume their lives are going to change drastically for the better. But claiming the money turns out to be more of a problem than a solution.

programme.title: A House In Jerusalem
programme.desc: Grappling with the loss of her mother, Rebecca and her father relocate to Jerusalem for a fresh start. In the eerie Valley of the Ghosts, strange occurrences unfold, and Rebecca embarks on a journey to unravel the mysteries within the old house and city.

programme.title: A Murder Of Crows Hush Little Baby
programme.desc: After a lantern parade, two-year-old Paulina is found missing from her room. The chilling kidnapping hurls Investigator Martin Bruhl back into a sleepless nightmare he experienced two years ago.

programme.title: Aurora (2019)
programme.desc: Aurora, a commitment-phobic party animal, meets Iranian Darian one night at a hot-dog stand in Lapland. Darian is running from death and Aurora is running from love. They need each other to finally stop running.

programme.title: The Second
programme.desc: An author's success following the release of her celebrated erotic memoir is threatened when her best friend and muse reveals the truth behind the memoir's provenance, igniting an incendiary tale of sex, lies and betrayal.

programme.title: Veins Of The World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his father’s vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Wonderfully Beautiful
programme.desc: Ranging from a 60-year-old retiree who no longer finds herself desirable to a daughter trying to make her breakthrough as a model, five women of different ages confront their self-image and the expectation they have for themselves and the people around them.

programme.title: La La La at Rock Bottom
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Shigeo loses his memory in a brutal attack. Taken in by Kasumi, he becomes the lead singer of a band and lives a new life- until memories of his dark past begin to return.

programme.title: FBI S5 - EP 2
programme.desc: Special agents Maggie Bell and Zidan from the New York branch of the FBI work together to keep the city and country safe.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S42 - EP 7
programme.desc: Ryan Seacrest takes over as the new host for the well-loved gameshow.

programme.title: America's Got Talent: Fantasy Team - EP 11
programme.desc: Fantasy Team welcomes some of the best acts to ever grace the Got Talent stages from all over the world. Judges will draft their ultimate line-up from America's choice of acts across the global Got Talent franchise. Singer and songwriter Mel B returns as a judge, alongside Executive Producer Simon Cowell, Heidi Klum and Howie Mandel, with Terry Crews to host.

programme.title: Lingo UK S3 - EP 30
programme.desc: Lingo is the fast paced word-play game that keeps on innovating for new audiences, with its mix of skill, tension, humour and the chance to win big cash prizes. Teams are pitted against each other in a battle to fill in the blanks and find words.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 - EP 8
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating and claimed the lives of millions. In recent years, these extreme weather events have become more and more commonplace. Using incredible archive and astonishing user-generated footage of some of the most extraordinary weather the planet has ever seen, we'll relive these weather spectacles in astonishing minute by minute detail.

programme.title: Cooking Up A Fortune - EP 17
programme.desc: Brand new series where the UK's most passionate cooks get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to launch their own food brand to the British public. Cooking Up a Fortune sees amateur foodies, who dream of escaping the rat race and cooking for a living, create and sell their dishes to hundreds of real diners in a purpose-built food arena. Each week the winning kitchen gets to launch their idea for a food business to paying customers in one of Europe's busiest food markets.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off Series 11: An Extra Slice - EP 7
programme.desc: Each week, BAFTA-winning comedian Jo Brand shines a light on all the goings on from inside the tent. With the help of a celebrity panel, Jo serves up an extra helping of unseen moments, as well as devouring the tasty offerings brought in by the studio audience. Jo and her panel are also joined by the latest baker to leave to get all the gossip from their time on the show. And Tom Allen appears as a regular guest, reviewing audience members' bakes.

programme.desc: A single dad has his hands full raising six rambunctious chipmunks in this animated comedy!

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger S4 Spinoff - EP 19
programme.desc: Ranger Kai's smoke bomb experiments lead to encountering a Giant Japanese Salamander trapped in rocks. He enlists the Junior Rangers to rescue and return it to its nest.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger S4 Spinoff - EP 20
programme.desc: Ranger Kyle discovers a flying lizard in the South Indian rainforest while resting up in the trees. He seeks help from the Junior Rangers to learn more about this unique creature.

programme.title: Sesame Street S52 - EP 29
programme.desc: Elmo's newly-adopted puppy Tango joins the show in a new recurring animated segment, "Elmo & Tango's Mysterious Mysteries"!

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures - EP 7
programme.desc: Popular children's presenter Andy Day takes viewers closer than ever before to the wildlife, large and small, that inhabits our planet. This fun-filled series combines Andy's jaw-dropping adventures across the globe with stunning footage from the Natural History Unit showing incredible creatures and their behaviours.

programme.title: 123 Number Squad S3 - EP 9
programme.desc: Mr. Mengo starts a picnic delivery: 4 orders, 8 items per basket. Chaos reigns, causing delays. Amidst slipping on apples, he seeks help to pack 4 baskets correctly! Sticky crafts 9 hats for the fashion show, but only 3 sea creatures are available to wear them. The Number Squad steps in to figure out how to showcase all 9 hats despite having only 3 sea creatures for the performance.

programme.desc: In their first mission as, like, total spies, three newly-befriended teen girls investigate the disappearances of people across Beverly Hills, uncovering a plot involving trendy makeover machines, a fancy space hotel and global destruction.

programme.title: Pokemon Horizons: The Series - EP 26
programme.desc: The series stars two new protagonists, Liko and Roy, who team up with the Rising Volt Tacklers, a group of adventurers that explore the Pokmon world and visit various regions. As they do, they are pursued by the Explorers, a mysterious organization seeking Liko's pendant for unknown reasons.

programme.desc: Ryan Seacrest takes over as the new host for the well-loved gameshow.

programme.title: Provocative - EP 127
programme.desc: Aiden is into deep trouble when his attempt to evade National Service gets found out. Shufen is undecided about Jonny’s offer to go overseas together.

programme.title: Kin - EP 199
programme.desc: Zaryn pours his marital woes to Rini when Syirah starts to get irrational. After finding out about Adina's stand regarding couples with big age gaps, Zara is left pensive about dating Razali. Zaryf is furious when he hears the rumours about his breakup with Hidayah.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off Series 11: An Extra Slice - EP 8
programme.desc: Each week, BAFTA-winning comedian Jo Brand shines a light on all the goings on from inside the tent. programme.desc: The kids are thrilled that Bernie has come back. But so has their old enemy Winston, who's about to kidnap the talented dolphin. Kevin and Holly must rescue their splashy friend before it's too late.

programme.title: Opening Of Singapore's 15th Parliament
programme.desc: President Tharman Shanmugaratnam delivers the opening address for the Opening of Parliament on 5th September. His speech outlines the priorities, policies and programmes of the government. (Live Subtitles & Sign Language Interpretation)

programme.title: Unboxing Art - EP 12
programme.desc: Sharda joins Peranakan fashion artist Raymond, owner of the historical Rumah Kim Choo Pte Ltd boutique. Determined to keep the Peranakan culture relevant through the power of fashion, Raymond is adapting the traditional style to the modern taste. Sharda tries her hand at Peranakan embroidery and beading, designing and modelling her own creations - and who else to learn it from but the consultant behind the costumes for Little Nyonya 2.

programme.title: (Live) News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - EP 17
programme.desc: Brothers Benson & Winson Moo, protégés of Chef Kang, turned his wonton noodles into a hawker hit. They won the Bib Gourmand, lost it, then won it back. Can they hold on this year?

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.

programme.title: Foodie Trio - EP 2 三吃客
programme.desc: In this episode, Foodie Trio will explore three chicken dishes. The first is a traditional Fuzhou specialty, followed by a visit to a nostalgic yet enchanting restaurant serving innovative cuisine. And finally a twists to the iconic local dish, Hainanese Chicken Rice, that appeal to kids. Each dish brings delightful surprises, and they even create their own personal Fuzhou red glutinous rice wine!

programme.title: Your Hand In Mine - EP 104 想握你的手
programme.desc: Using the local society issues as a backbone, this drama depicts the lives of families of different background residing in the same neighbourhood, from the cold and self-centered to the understanding of the true meaning of love. The story reflects the meaning of how blood is thicker than water and the neighbourhood spirit of helping and watching out for each other.

programme.title: Lost Transport
programme.desc: Spring 1945. A train deporting hundreds of Jewish prisoners gets stranded near a small German village occupied by the Red Army. A chance encounter between German girl Winnie, Dutch Jew Simone and Russian Vera leads to an unexpected friendship.

programme.title: Three Times Nothing
programme.desc: When three homeless friends win the lottery, they assume their lives are going to change drastically for the better. But claiming the money turns out to be more of a problem than a solution.

programme.title: A Murder Of Crows Hush Little Baby
programme.desc: After a lantern parade, two-year-old Paulina is found missing from her room. The chilling kidnapping hurls Investigator Martin Bruhl back into a sleepless nightmare he experienced two years ago.

programme.title: The Second
programme.desc: An author's success following the release of her celebrated erotic memoir is threatened when her best friend and muse reveals the truth behind the memoir's provenance, igniting an incendiary tale of sex, lies and betrayal.

programme.title: My Daughter On The Run
programme.desc: When the police deem her daughter’s runaway case as not a priority, Jeanne has to look for her daughter by herself. Jeanne begins a journey into hell, as she learns that her daughter has become a stranger to her.

programme.title: Veins Of The World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his father’s vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Geranium
programme.desc: Just before her final exams, 19 years old Defne, must return to her hometown after her father's stroke. Although it is a perfect opportunity for her to heal their relationship, her trip back home inadvertently causes her to be sucked into family drama.

programme.title: Wonderfully Beautiful
programme.desc: Ranging from a 60-year-old retiree who no longer finds herself desirable to a daughter trying to make her breakthrough as a model, five women of different ages confront their self-image and the expectation they have for themselves and the people around them.

programme.title: Road To Your Heart
programme.desc: In this sweet road-trip movie, Basson, a young businessman journeys to Cape Town for his father’s funeral and to fulfill certain tasks in the will. He meets bohemian Amory along the way and they encounter hilarious moments, disappointments and heartaches.

programme.title: La La La at Rock Bottom
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Shigeo loses his memory in a brutal attack. Taken in by Kasumi, he becomes the lead singer of a band and lives a new life- until memories of his dark past begin to return.

programme.title: All My Friends Hate Me
programme.desc: Pete is cautiously excited about reuniting with his college crew for a birthday weekend. But, one by one, his friends slowly turn against him. Is he being punished, is he paranoid, or is he part of some sick joke?

programme.title: Behind the Mountains
programme.desc: After spending four years in jail for vandalizing his place of work, Rafik has only one plan, take his son to the mountains and show him his amazing discovery.

programme.title: You Are Not Alone
programme.desc: When Eva returns to her house on the day of her divorce, she finds a bouquet of red roses outside the door. Attached is the note: "You are not alone." The sender is anonymous.

programme.title: Playmaker
programme.desc: A former footballer and jailbird, Ivo is no longer interested in football. That is until he meets Lukas, a talented young player, and decides to help him pursue a professional career. But his criminal past soon catches up with him.
